name: Music Festival
description: Join us for a lively day filled with music from various genres. Enjoy performances from local bands and artists while indulging in delicious food from vendors.

name: Art Exhibition
description: Explore a stunning collection of contemporary and traditional art from local and international artists. Engage with the creators and learn about their inspirations.

name: Clothing Festival
description: A celebration of fashion featuring local designers. Browse through unique clothing stalls, attend workshops, and enjoy live fashion shows throughout the day.

name: Crockery Exhibition
description: Discover exquisite crockery pieces from renowned artisans. Participate in interactive sessions on the history and craftsmanship of crockery making.

name: Handloom Festival
description: Experience the beauty of handwoven textiles. Meet skilled weavers, attend demonstrations, and shop for unique handloom products directly from the artisans.

name: Spices Exhibition
description: Immerse yourself in the world of spices. Learn about their origins, health benefits, and culinary uses while tasting a variety of spice-infused dishes.

name: Rides Festival
description: A fun-filled day for families with rides, games, and entertainment. Enjoy thrilling rides, carnival games, and tasty snacks in a festive atmosphere.

name: Books Exhibition
description: A paradise for book lovers! Browse a wide selection of books, meet authors, and attend book signings and readings from various genres.

name: Food Festival
description: Savor delicious cuisines from around the world. Enjoy cooking demonstrations, food tastings, and learn new recipes from top chefs.

name: Handicraft Exhibition
description: Explore beautiful handicrafts from local artisans. Find unique handmade items and participate in workshops to create your own crafts.

name: Furniture Festival
description: Showcasing innovative designs and craftsmanship in furniture. Meet designers, attend talks, and find the perfect pieces for your home.

name: Jewellery Exhibition
description: A showcase of stunning jewellery from local and international designers. Discover unique pieces and participate in jewellery-making workshops.
